data.eml:eml: Cave-inhabiting Neobisiidae (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) from China, with description of four new species of Bisetocreagris Ćurčić

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volker Mahnert, Yun-chun Li (2016): Cave-inhabiting Neobisiidae (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) from China, with description of four new species of Bisetocreagris Ćurčić. Revue suisse de Zoologie 123: 259-268, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155299
